actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Lob Magma
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Pyroclastic Burst (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The mephit exhales an explosive blast of lava in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 11 STR save. On a failure, a creature takes 7 (2d6) fire damage and is pushed up to 10 feet away from the mephit and knocked prone. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Death Burst
special_abilities.desc: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 11 DEX save or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the mephit, knocked prone, and catch on fire. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the creature on fire takes 3 (1d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of molten rock.
